mapper.update: update sys_menu set del_flag=1 , update_time=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id,name,description,pid,url,permission,type,level,appid,remarks from sys_menu where id=#{id} and del_flag=0

select d.id,d.name,d.description,d.pid,d.url,d.permission,d.type,d.level,d.appid,d.remarks from sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_user b on a.id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu_role c on b.role_id=c.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu d on d.id=c.menu_id where a.id=1 and d.del_flag=0 ORDER by pid
